title: unexpected error
body: does anybody know how to fix this. it only goes from 33% and if I'm luck it gets to 35 before crashing saying an unexpected error has occurred please look at the logs for more... how do I fix this I really want to join in on the fun

replies.body: At this step, the patcher is trying to download files but is somehow blocked or interrupted due to a connection issue.  We have a solid[ Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that contains some steps towards resolving this.  Hope that helps!
